name: Pneumatic Depths INDEV
description:
!!These are early pre-alpha builds of this game. It is nowhere near complete, and the visuals are still in the prototyping stage.!!

Currently the game doesn't have much at all; this is mainly for me to get feedback on the features that do exist.

This will stop being updated when this game goes into the alpha/beta stages, and eventually the full game will be released separately.

Have feedback? Post it in the discussion area!

Controls:

WASD, mouse, space: Movement

Scroll wheel or number keys: Select hotbar slots

Tab: Open/close the inventory

F: Interact with objects (your crosshair will turn green if you can interact with something!)

Click while holding a tool: Use that tool

Click & hold with an empty hand: Drag movable objects around.

[Build tool controls]

Left click: Place

Right click: Remove

Q/E: Change blueprint

ALT+Click: Select blueprint

X: Switch attachment point

R: Rotate
